Garmin

I've built a watch-face for my watch and made it public. A watch-face is the view you see when your GPS watch is in normal mode. It displays the time, the battery level, the date, a Bluetooth icon (if phone is connected) and your daily steps. The code is open-source and hosted here. The watch-face is available for download at Garmin Connect IQ.
Screenshot
The orange bar indicate the number of daily steps compared to the daily steps goal. The color can be modified.

Programming languages and development

Jekyll theme adapted from centrarium. Figures with d3.js. Hosted on github.
